rows.label: qev090504_MSG0002
rows.name:
He said you had something special he'd never before
seen in a soldier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090504_MSG0003
rows.name: That's why he's working with you now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090504_MSG0004
rows.name:
I was pretty envious when I first heard it, but seeing
you take on that request with zero hesitation...
Well, now I see what he means.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090504_MSG0005
rows.name:
Anyway, please head to Noctilum with Sensei and
bring Clarissa back safe.[ST:wait ]
